-- CSV files under sales_data External data sources

 -- This query uses the external data source to connect to the data lake, and the OPENROWSET function now only need
 -- to reference the relative path to the .csv files.
 -- BULK busca por /csv folder and *.csv all the csv files.
 SELECT *
 FROM
     OPENROWSET(
         BULK 'csv/*.csv',
         DATA_SOURCE = 'sales_data',
         FORMAT = 'CSV',
         PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
     ) AS orders
